Reviews.Author: Aarron
Reviews.Content: I'm a regular here, have been before yelping. The location is very nice, as well as the accessibility to get your coffee. Whether it be inside or a quick ride through the drive-thru. Always friendly service and they're always attentive to your needs. I don't know about you, but my coffee has to be just right!!

Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: This is my go-to Starbucks when I'm on my way to work. I work early, so I always go here right when they open at 5. All of the staff members are always super friendly whenever I go here. I'm impressed that seemingly every person at this Starbucks is cheerful and very nice that early in the morning. 5-stars for that.   As far as the drinks go; it's Starbucks. There isn't really any difference between this location and any of the others I frequent. The review is for this location so I feel like writing about the quality of Starbucks coffee in general isn't really the point. The staff get the 5 stars here.

Reviews.Author: Lainie
Reviews.Content: THE BEST CONSISTENTMT quality of customer service and product prep I used to work near Cheyenne & MLK location so l'd get my fave (2 Trenta lemonades fizzed (not lemon-ale) no ice, no sweetener) about 4x/week. Moved job location so I flexed between this location and Charleston & Town Center, as I live between pretty equally.  After several fumbled orders at the  Charleston & Town Center location, Boca Park location EVERY day‼  Fizz & size of my usual concoction take a bit longer than most drinks. Thus, I drive thru and always tip the friendly server. Never excuses about why they can't fill my cup since I don't get ice, no muss, no fuss...  Yesterday I was told that the manager here used to manage the Charleston & Town Center spot. The difference shows, BIG TIME‼‼  Keep up the good work, it brightens my day!

Reviews.Author: Audra
Reviews.Content: Every time I come here they are out of their sweets. The latest and greatest are the Salted Carmel Squares. I tried it once at the Ft Apache Starbucks and since they've come out I've never been able to get one at this location, they are always out and this is the location closest to my home. Employees are friendly for sure but I hate not getting what I want when I want it.  Hey Starbucks try keeping more than 3 a day in stock ;)

Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: Sadly, this Starbucks has now garner a one-star from me. I've been going to this location for about a year as it is the closest to my house. However, I am going to be willing to change up my morning routine to avoid coming here.  As many others have pointed out, this is somewhat of a training location. Staff changes on a weekly basis. You may never know who will wait on you. The staff that does remain is a mixed bunch. Some take the time to get to know you, your order, etc. Others do not. It is apparent which ones are which.   The morning team cannot keep up with the demand of the location. It's sad when a drink takes 20 minutes to make. There is no method to the madness. If you go inside, they don't put your cups in the bunch with the drive-thru orders. So, be sure to ask for your drink.   The drive-thru in the mornings is a scene outside of the Hunger Games. If you don't time it right in the morning, you're stuck going in. If you do stick the drive- thru out, there is no order to pulling in. I'm actually shocked there hasn't been an accident or a fist-fight. People cut you off.  If you make it into the drive-thru expect to wait a good 10-15 minutes. I've constantly been faced with getting a drink and then having to go back inside as they made my drink wrong.    The inside of the Starbucks is not the nicest. It needs a good cleaning somedays.   I will only be going there if I have to.

Reviews.Author: Ellen
Reviews.Content: Starbucks!  Well let me begin with saying you get what you pay for!  Yes, coffee is cheaper at 7-11.  That doesn't mean the coffee is anywhere near as good as what Starbucks sells.    I ordered my standard of venti nonfat decaf latte.  It was perfectly prepared and served hot to the sip.  Ask for a stopper if you want your brew to stay hot until you arrive at your destination.    The baristas here at this specific Starbucks are friendly and work the drive-thru line very fast.  I was behind more than 5 cars and was through the line no less than 6 minutes!  I would say that it's always busy during  rush hour  in the morning.  Rush hour being between 7:45am and 9:00am.  There is parking out front and if you are early in the day the other stores/restaurants are not open yet so you really have no issue with parking.  They do offer free wifi along with bicycle parking.

Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: Iced coffee is the business! A friendly staff and fast service!  You can't complain when they give you what you ordered quickly and with a smile.  I am boring, and an iced coffee black is hard to screw up, but they got it right!

Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: The people working here are so friendly! I love this location!  The atmosphere is cozy and perfect for chilling out for a bit.   They are located in a nice shopping center, so you can stop in and pick something up on your way to shop.  I love the layout.

Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: Although, I love my Starbucks a few times a week and this particular location is the closest to my house... I will drive further just to avoid going here. Unfortunately, I have had too many unpleasant experiences at this location. The crew seems to be ever changing (not sure if this is due to the fact that this location is deemed a training facility or not), more often than not they get my order wrong, & and one time I swear I was served a drink made with sour soy milk. (I of course asked the Barista to remake it--which I don't like to have to do, but the first one tasted so bad it churned my stomach for the entire day) Furthermore, I find this all very unfortunate considering the fact that this location is very spacious and has a great amount of seats & plug-ins to hang out and use the free Wi-fi. However, the last few visits I opted out of coffee & only ordered tea to try to enjoy the atmosphere--big mistake! I usually enjoy the hustle and bustle of a coffee shop, even find it to be soothing, but not here. Way too noisy!  Overall, I guess I find that there are differences from location to location even if the menus are the same. For me the people make it or break it, and there's just not enough consistency at this location. -B

Reviews.Author: Joonmyoung
Reviews.Content: This is the best Starbuck cafe location I have ever been to. They put a long table for customers to read something or study pretty much in the center of the cafe. Electrical outlets are easy to find on the wall and plug in your electronic devices. The employees are very nice and friendly. During the week, they close at 10:30PM but they don't kick you out at 10:30 sharp unlike other Starbucks cafe locations I have been to. You can stay on for 10-20 more minutes, not that you should do so but they don't rush you out. I really appreciate their outstanding patience and hospitality.  If you come visit Las Vegas and want to get a coffee or a cup of tea, try out this cafe. You won't be disappointed, I guarantee.

Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: Nice vibe inside, however each drive thru experience stinks. This morning, their team gave me extra hot instead of kids temp, and forgot about my pastry order.

Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I like most Starbucks. The only thing that can ruin a Starbucks is poor management, since otherwise they are very much alike.  Although restaurant size and the presence of outdoor seating and sufficient outlets for laptops do affect my review.  This Starbucks has always been clean when I've visited, and has friendly staff. It's not particularly large, but I've been in smaller ones. This is one of the stores that serves food- a few sandwiches, cheese plates (yay, brie!), etc, along with cookies and pastries. No complaints!

Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite Starbucks. Everyone there is super friendly (makes me wonder if they put anything in the coffee for employees...LOL) but not the fake friendly that is annoying -- very authentic. Based on the level of service, the place is managed well.   You see a lot of the same people there everyday.   Ample outlets for computers. Cozy place to take your laptop and get some work done or simply kick back and have a drink.

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Today just kinda did me out of this location because both my sister and I got burnt coffee. We could taste the flavor of our coffees (peppermint mocha and white chocolate mocha), but it tasted off. Every month, at least one time, we always get a burnt cup of coffee. Now why not just go back in and get another cup? Well because I'm usually in the drive thru, and I'm on a time frame to get somewhere.  I completely understand customer service. I have worked in it for 6+ years, and I always listen to what my customer needs. I'm tired of being cut off and having to repeat my order. Yes I know it's apart of life but still...  And I didn't understand the day of Thanksgiving how this location was out of Creme Brûlée, White Chocolate Mocha, Eggnog Latte, and something else holiday related. You know you are opened, please order accordingly....  I'll still come here because there are a couple great baristas that can make a great cup of coffee, but overall not a great location.

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Well thanks to the corporate culture most Starbucks provide very similar coffee and  dining  experiences so I'll focus on the intangibles.  This Starbucks is in a little complex with a large covered patio, so plenty of seating and shade. Also, this Starbucks is generally open until 10:00 pm. It is the Starbucks open the latest that is not built into another store or casino.

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I have visited this Starbucks drive-thru almost every morning for the last 2 years. It used to take 5 minutes to order and get through the drive-thru, today it took 20 and averages 15 minutes other mornings. I typically visit between 5:50am and 6:10am. The staff is friendly enough, but too slow now for whatever reason.   It is the most convenient coffee/breakfast stop on my way to work, otherwise I would go elsewhere. I'm tempted to stop being lazy and make my own coffee/breakfast simply to avoid the hassle!

Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Love the staff at this Starbucks, always friendly and polite. Which is important because this location is always busy given that it is in boca park.

Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Drive thru seems to be ALWAYS packed.  Interior is on the smaller side, but still room to lounge.

Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: I like that there is no tip jar at this drive-thru.    Not sure why Starbucks started doing this.   Like they don't charge enough for the coffee.  I don't get it and I won't tip at a drive-thru.  They had my son's favorite Birthday cake pops here and service was friendly and they got the order right.  Cant' wait for the fall to get my Pumpkin Spiced flavor coffee!

Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: When I need coffee, I need coffee.  And it's not pretty.  While I stumble through my order, nice cashiers and baristas with good attitudes and a lot of patience are appreciated.  The staff here is super nice so I'll go out of my way to go to this location instead of the location closer to me at the 10000 block of Charleston.  Also, the drinks taste better - although that could be a byproduct of the niceness.  I also like that they have the English muffin sandwiches.  (When I'm really tired, I'll order an egg mcmuffin, which is always amusing to the Starbucks cashier.)  Not all the locations have them.  Plus this location opens at 5am and closes at 11pm on weekdays.  Very convenient, especially for Summerlin where a lot of places open late and close early.  When I'm less tired and have time to just hang out, I'll go to a local coffee shop.  However, it's nice to have a consistent product and an ordering system I somewhat comprehend in a dazed and confused state.

Reviews.Author: Precious
Reviews.Content: I love coffee and smoking but when I go outside to sit I see non smoking stickers on their table. Well that's a total turn off. But ok no problem. Rules are rules. The two star gets taken off because of the cleanliness. I get to the counter to order and theres a used coffee lid on there. While waiting for my coffee I see coffee beans and a sugar packet one the outside part of the counter where they make the coffees. I'm not talking about the station where the customers mix their coffee. It was just out in plain view for everyone to see. There are certain things that are out of our control but others you can and cleanliness is one of the.  I do have to say though, this is the best tasting coffee I've had compared to their other location. 10 stars for that

Reviews.Author: Georgia
Reviews.Content: This is one of the worst Starbucks in Vegas. Every time I go they whine about making a pour over veranda blonde coffee because it take 3 minutes. After the 3 rd visit and the continuos whining I asked the manager what is a pour over? He said   no big deal, it's kinda like a French press but, easier  and I said   then what's the problem ? People order non fat sugar free lAttes no foam blah blah  and he laughed and said   oh, I have to slap them around .   3 days later went back and same attitude. They ALWAYS fill the coffee to the very top so, it spills on me. EVERY time. What do they care they make enough money. The Starbucks up Charleston about  a mile or so away is the complete opposite great service !!! Great coffee!

Reviews.Author: Jenna
Reviews.Content: the credit and debit card reader was down and I stopped by to get a cup as a gift, I luckily had a $20 bill and the cup was $16.95. the lady asked what I wanted and I joking told her  looks like I will get a cup and no drink today  the sweet cashier said she's so sorry for the inconvenience and offered to comp my drink so I could get both. these small acts of kindness is what makes customers come back. this location is not too convenient for me, but I will be back because the customer service is phenomenal and they truly care about your business. five stars Starbucks.

Reviews.Author: Sveta
Reviews.Content: Starbucks in Boca Park till 10 p.m. I like this Starbucks on Charleston because it's good place to work. They have long table in the middle of cafe. And it's open till 10 p.m. That is quite convenient when you have plenty staff to do. I like work in library too but here is coffee too :)

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is for the Starbucks inside Target in Boca, not the one outside Target. Very unhappy employee this evening. No one in line, not busy, and from the initial  greeting  she seemed bothered that she had to make an ice tea. Not going to go into specifics, but this hasn't been the only time staff seemed unhappy.

Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: The barista at the pick-up counter inside the store for several hours on Sunday, Dec. 15, 2013, belted out, in a screeching voice that caused people to come to attention, each time their orders were ready (she's sort of short in height and has reddish/light auburn straight hair). It was almost comical at some point. I was there working on my computer and noticed customers exchanging glances with each other as it continued loudly. The other employees were great -- business-like, friendly. But she was robotic and appeared to be on a mission, hollering out in a loud, high-pitched voice as each order was completed and placed on the pick-up counter. I'll avoid ordering there again if she's inside working! I'll go across the street to Whole Foods, where there's no screeching!

Reviews.Author: Sofia
Reviews.Content: Starbucks is life. Every morning I wake up and get my vente chai tea latte. The staff knows my name by heart and literally Angela my coffee gal pal gives me life and inspiration. The smell of Starbucks gives me a sort of buzz and the caffeine makes me fit and ready for the day. I may be called a basic white girl but I don't care because Starbucks is life

Reviews.Author: Sarah Anne Elise
Reviews.Content: It's a great place to catch up with friends, do homework, relax, read, etcetera. I love coming to Starbucks to just sit and get some work done while I put Netflix on the background. Today, I was at this specific store catching up with a friend and I tried their new feature of ordering online through their app. My app said it would be ready in 3-5 minutes but it was ready for me to pick up at the counter right away. Each time I come here, my order is always perfect and they're always so generous with their caramel! The only thing that j wasn't a fan of was their choice of music... It was a nice rock station but then it turned into some terrible elevator music.

Reviews.Author: Amyra
Reviews.Content: The boca park Starbucks is one of the best I have been to in terms of both service and quality! When I have the choice I go to this one every time.

Reviews.Author: Clairin
Reviews.Content: New tea and refresher coming on Tuesday, July 7.  Want something sweet but cutting back on calories, the mini-frappuccinos are still in stock. S'mores and Lemon Bar for us today. There's a Red Velvet, cupcake, cinnamon roll and more too. http://www.starbucks.com/menu/drinks/frappuccino-blended-beverages/lemon-bar-frappuccino-blended-beverage Nutritional information available online.

Reviews.Author: Jennet
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love Starbucks!!! It's the best place you can have a drink of coffee and others, I usually order latte and caramel frapp. I went with my friends and we ordered 3 caramel frapps and 2 lattes and we got everything but they didn't get  our latte so we are waiting 15 minutes and then the guy asks what do you need? We said latte and we had to wait another 6 minutes to get it. Besides that I love that this location its 24 hours. And everything else is amazing))) (btw if your in a casino the prices go higher)

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This is a busy Starbucks.  The staff was very friendly and prompt in serving customers their orders.  I do like looking over the music selections while I am waiting for my order.  I had a Chai Tea Latte, my usual.  It was a beautiful day and I was able to sit outside to enjoy it.  Nice.

Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Is there a rating above 5 stars?? What is there not to love about this Starbucks, located at the cross streets of Rampart and Charleston. There has never been a time when I see this Starbucks dirty, out of supplies or anything negative. Even when they are full and packed, the employees still make time for me, the customer.  They are always friendly with a smile, and provide me with customer service that is above and beyond. Many times Starbucks frowns upon complicated drink orders, but this Starbucks works closely with their customers to achieve the perfect drink!  From the manager, to the employees, to the environment, everything at this Starbucks is phenomenal!

Reviews.Author: Norm
Reviews.Content: This is my go to Starbuck's after donating blood.  It's on the way home, and the taste of the espresso is especially good then.  I have always had good service here and the drive through wait is usually not bad.  The parking is bad, but it's the design of this section of Boca Park.

Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: Drove thru yesterday a little before 5pm. Payed $4.81 for a beverage I was able to get maybe 4 sips of because they always fill the cup with ice. I had asked for light ice, apparently they do not know what this means. Thanks for charging me almost $5 to not give me what I asked for.

Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: Seriously the slowest drive through I've ever been through!!! They take FOREVER.  Even when I get up to pay my one drink it still isn't ready!  I really hate that this Starbucks is the most convenient for me.

Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: This Starbucks has the best staff and I've been to at least 25 other Starbucks is in the Las Vegas Valley, don't get me wrong the staff at the other  locations are usually four stars but the Starbucks in Boca Park is  Number one in getting the drive through customers quickly through compared to other locations such as Starbucks on Town center and Charleston. The inside is set up very well with couch area sitting hightop table sitting lower desk  type sitting with outlets to charge your devices everywhere but most of all the staff there truly is amazing I will drive past two other Starbucks just so I can go to this one that's how much I love their staff and I think you will too actually I know you will :-)

Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: Starbucks are all the same, but this one has amazing baristas who are completely forgiving of those who walk in as zombies in need of a caffeine fix; and I appreciate that!! I usually stick with teas in the morning and the tazo lemonade in the afternoon, but when I'm ready to transition to coffee I'll come here to get my fix~

Reviews.Author: Casi
Reviews.Content: This is always my favorite location, because it's close to me and there's usually plenty of seating inside if I want to read or work on my computer. Today though, Laurie was so awesome I had to write a review. I got a caramel brulee frappe and asked for salted topping. The guy at the counter didn't write it on the cup, so I asked them to put some on, and told Laurie that I got that frappe because I wanted the free holiday drink, but that I really love the salted caramel frappe so she insisted on making me one! She was just really friendly and had a great attitude and it was very refreshing. Thanks Laurie!

Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: The baristas are always friendly at this Boca Park location.  The parking and outdoor seating here are cramped, it looks like they had to carve out a portion of the parking lot for the drive through entrance.  The drive through is pretty busy, seems like it's usually faster to go in.   Inside you will find some comfy seating and tables where you can sit and work or geek out on yelp while enjoying your favorite beverage.  I frequent this Starbucks often and have never had an issue with my order or the drinks.

Reviews.Author: Channele
Reviews.Content: While I definitely understand that a Starbucks drive-thru in the morning is always going to be a little hellish, this place definitely eases that pain and makes it just a wee better when you need a latte in the morning.  The first time I came here, they messed up my order - frappuccino instead of latte.  What?!  I didn't want to be  that guy  in the drive-thru so I just took it and left.  It was still really, really good... just cold.  In December.  Oh well.  The second time I came here, they were on point and with a few cars in front of me it was relatively fast.  The drive-thru is kind of unfortunately located as if there is a line you basically have to been in the driving area between shopping complexes.  (Maybe that's why they try to speed through the drive-thru orders?)  Other than that, it's fine.  The employees seem to enjoy their job here unlike other locations I've visited.

Reviews.Author: Chance
Reviews.Content: I have my set Starbucks but this is one that's closer to work.  My only gripe and I have a lot usually.  The barista behind the bar has a disconnect.  I over heard him say he was over his day.  Which I'm assuming he's had a rough day.  But think about a person who's just beginning his day and going in to get a pick-me-up.  Really not gonna have a good experience if there's a grump behind the bar.    Also the few times I've ordered they always fall short at the bar, whether it be a messy station to an over poured drink, which leaves the bottom or the sides of your cup sticky.  One time I had to ask for a second cup, because the delivery was soo poor.  I used to work for Starbucks and I took pride in my work.  I just wish people still did.

Reviews.Author: Myra
Reviews.Content: Starbucks SECRET menu... Shh  Swirl Pow Hot Chocolate  One Word: Orgasmic.  Sweet Bitter Not the other way around. -TM Sheila  Cotton Candy Frapaccino  Mood: Sweetly satisfying -TM KK

Reviews.Author: j
Reviews.Content: I don't like to write negative reviews but this place is so dysfunctional and unorganized. They took forever to make my wife's peppermint mocha, i handed them the empty creamer so they could refill it for not just me but the next guy. Fast forward couple minutes later I'm still waiting, I asked how much longer it was going till be to fill up the creamer...I get handed a cup with cream in it? Note to self, take advantage of a Starbucks being on every corner and go to another one next time.

Reviews.Author: Garth
Reviews.Content: Store is average but ordered my Dubble expresso with steamed cream on my Starbucks account card and she dumped in cold, didn't even ask how much I wanted, I said did you steam it and she said no and walked away. I left it on the counter and went across the street to barns and Noble for a great one. Worst Starbucks ever. Glad for the other choice as u live just a block away.

Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: This is my go to location. Close to my house and very nice staff. The only con is this place is always busy (which is great) but in turn they run out of things very often but they usually never miss a beat and always double check orders. I rarely have a bad drink there which is important for me because if you forget my soy, i wont be happy as a lactard, im very intense about accidentally receiving milk.

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: So we live pretty close to this one, and I'm a semi frequent visitor. I usually get the passion tea or the iced coffee with hazelnut and milk.  Now, I'm not one of those normal Starbuckers who knows all the lingo, so this past time I went I asked for a  pump  of hazelnut in my coffee (I wanted to sound cool!) and the lady asks  just one? or do you want a set?  WTF?! I froze! I was like  Uh yea, the second one  I could hear her laughing, then a man came on and repeated my order.   Not nice Starbucks lady! Anywho, my iced coffee tasted like shit, but my son loved his warm cocoa and the mini scones I purchased for the bf's dr and receptionist looked HELLA yummy!!  I'll probably go back since its close, but I guess I better learn the terms.

Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Great location. Great setup. Friendly baristas. Slightly awkward drive through but the inside is wonderful.

Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: I've been coming here for a good amount of time to study for a big exam of mine coming up. They keep the place pretty clean and it has nice leather couches and regular seating. The coffee is good and the baristas are polite and helpful. Bring ear phones though if you really need to concentrate. This place is fairly high traffic and people love to have conversations with friends here. That's not a bad thing though, if anything it adds to the atmosphere which is friendly and accessible. Enjoy your ridiculously long drink order here!

Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Oh well what can I say it is Starbucks. It's a must-have every morning. I Like this Starbucks & the drive-through service is pretty good. Friendly with good customer service. They are rarely out of anything.  GO HERE!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: I really don't think I need to review a Starbucks. Honestly, if you haven't been to a Starbucks, I doubt you have a Yelp... And if you do, get off of it and go to Starbucks! They have great drinks for coffee lovers and coffee haters alike as well as tasty treats! Also a great place to sit and read or do some homework/studying.

Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: What a rude Manager?   This is not the Starbucks experience that I am used to, and because of this will no longer be coming to any Starbucks location.    I came to Summerlin to visit my grandmother and went through the drive thru to order two drinks.   As I got home and tasted the drinks, it appears they were made incorrectly (wrong milk and wrong tea blend).   I figured I would call and let someone know.   The person who answered told me they would remake the drinks.   The next day I went back to the store and told them about the drinks and the Manager was extremely abrasive and asked for the receipt.    I told him I don't normally keep my receipts but that it was purchased in my Starbucks card, and to look it up on my card.   He arguably told me he could not look it up on the card and I needed to download the Starbucks app.    Okay, now the arguing needs to stop right here!!!!     I told the manager I spoke to someone who told me to come back.   He continued to argue with me and told me I need a receipt, and that his team doesn't mess up on drinks.  At that point I walked away and asked for his district Manager phone number  to let him/her know what type of customer experience they are providing.  As of today (6 days later) no call back from District Manager.    No more Starbucks for me!   Customer service is more important than coffee!  I will be going to Petes from now on.

Reviews.Author: Dominique
Reviews.Content: I am not a Starbucks person. In my late teens, I loved Starbucks. A 24 hour coffee house when I was under the age of 21 was where it was at! However... As my taste for great coffee improved... My love and tolerance for Starbucks declined. I will say that they are located in every major grocery store... On every major corner of every neighborhood... And now In target... And hospitals... So they must be doing something right. Because of the later hours of this location and convenience... I find myself sitting in this coffee shop to study quite often, drinking tolerable coffee... And tea.   The parking... Well... It sucks. Park by Baja Fresh and walk so your car doesn't get hit. The ambiance of the place is pretty typical of Starbucks... Lots of uncomfortable seating... Tables... Convenient outlets... The usual... Dim Lighting :), soft music, and cold cold air in the winter... I'm not sure they use the heater.  The service is always fast and efficient. They don't over charge me for a quarter cup of warm soy milk in my coffee... And they are always welcoming. Remember to Tip for good service.   The products are consistent. Usually overly acidic for my taste... But... Always consistent. I can appreciate them offering lighter sides to their high calorie drinks. My favorite winter drink to order here is tea... Unless I need a big boost... And it's always a medium triple shot soy sf vanilla latte... I don't venture out of the box often to avoid disappointment with the place. They are getting four stars... Not for the product so much as the service and convenience...

Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Fairly nice Starbucks with outside seating fast service and their logo which is the mecca of shopping.

Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: AWESOME CREW! I had to place a last minute order of 2 coffee to go boxes and pastries for 40 people at 730am and they pulled it off with smiles on their faces and still managed to keep the line of customers going! Thank you Sal and your crew for saving my day!!!

Reviews.Author: Misha
Reviews.Content: I'm currently obsessed with a custom Starbucks beverage:  Very Berry Hibiscus Refresher or Strawberry Acai Refresher with coconut milk instead of water.  (Try it sometime, trust me.)  I was running back to work after a doctor appointment, needing a quick snack and beverage because I hadn't had lunch yet.    The girl at the drive thru was pleasant, she informed me that the sandwich I ordered wasn't available so she suggested another.  She handed me the sandwich and the Very Berry Hibiscus Refresher and I took off.  I later noticed that my drink, usually a lovely shade of lavender, was mostly white.  I shook it to mix up the berries, but it was still a pale pink.  There were only about three berries with some fragments in my cup.    Additionally, I had asked for  light ice , since they usually fill the entire cup with ice leaving you about five good gulps, but you can see from the photo that the cup is full of ice.  The drink tasted very bland and I wasn't satisfied with it at all.

Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I love this starbucks!  The atmosphere is so comfy and the drinks are great.  The mozzarella and basil lunch sandwiches are my favorite.    The bacon and gouda breakfast sandwiches are also very tasty!

Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Starbucks is fine, but there's usually nothing special about the individual stores. This is no different. The beat feature here is that there's a drive thru that's not too slow. That's actually the only time I visit this starbucks.

Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: drive tru line is really quick but service is slightly below satisfactory & they messed up my drink orders quite a few times and when I tell them I want it corrected they get pretty bad attitude. I work in a coffee shop as well so I come here just because I don't want to go to my work on my days, so that's my only reason for coming here.

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: this Starbucks at 8780 W Charleston Blvd #105, Las Vegas, NV 89117, is horrible. I waited almost 6 minutes for the young male clerk to notice me as he was bull s'tting with another customer who was trying out a bunch of sample drinks today at 1:15pm. The clerk mentioned he and the other staff all leave at 6pm tonight for a meeting to this other customer. I hope someone reads this review to tell them they need to acknowledge other customers. Once the young clerk finally saw me looking at my watch, he then said he would be right with me. There was a line starting to form at that time. The counter top was dirty with the previous customer trying out his sample drinks and it was not cleaned. The clerk got my drink wrong 2 times before I paid and when it was finally made by a young Asian girl, it was wrong again. She never apologized for making the wrong drink. There was a heavy set white girl working the window that kept saying she wants to eat all the caramel, I assumed she did by her size. And to think, I left a $1.00 tip in the jar when other people left small change. I would never go back to this facility again.
